text: The Rensselaer Engineers represented Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute in ECAC women's ice hockey during the 2014–15 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season. The Engineers did not qualify for the ECAC tournament. ==Offseason== *August 23:Heidi Huhtamaki was invited to participate in Team Finland Camp to qualify for Team Finland in the 2015 World Championships. ===Recruiting=== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#F7001F;color:white;" | Player || Position ||Nationality||Notes |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Amanda Kimmerle || Defense || || Attended Anoka (MN) High School |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Marisa Raspa || Forward || || played for the North American Hockey Academy |- align="center" bgcolor=" " | Whitney Renn || Forward || || Played with Little Caesars Detroit |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" | Shayna Tomlinson || Forward || || Played with Assabet Valley |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |} == 2014–15 Engineers == ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style="background:#F7001F;color:white;"| Regular Season ==References== Rensselaer Category:RPI Engineers women's ice hockey seasons RPI RPI
title: 2014–15 Rensselaer Engineers women's ice hockey season
